properties.description: This is the master pipeline which pulls Asset, Person, Jobplan,  location ,Work Order and Work Status from  maximo to raw zone
This is the master pipeline which pulls Asset, Person, Jobplan,  location ,Work Order and Work Status from  maximo to raw zone
To copy jobplan from Maximo to Raw landing zone.

query.value: select Maximo.jobplan.JPNUM,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.jobplan.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|")','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.jobplan.JPDURATION,Maximo.jobplan.STATUS,Maximo.jobplan.PRIORITY,Maximo.jobplan.JOBPLANID,Maximo.jobplan.DOWNTIME,Maximo.jobplan.LABORCODE,Maximo.jobplan.SITEID,Maximo.jobplan.ORGID,Maximo.jobplan.PERSONGROUP,Maximo.jobplan.PLUSCREVNUM,Maximo.jobplan.PLUSCCHANGEDATE from Maximo.jobplan where date(pluscchangedate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy jobplan from Maximo to Raw landing zone.

query.value: select Maximo.jobplan.JPNUM,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.jobplan.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|")','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.jobplan.JPDURATION,Maximo.jobplan.STATUS,Maximo.jobplan.PRIORITY,Maximo.jobplan.JOBPLANID,Maximo.jobplan.DOWNTIME,Maximo.jobplan.LABORCODE,Maximo.jobplan.SITEID,Maximo.jobplan.ORGID,Maximo.jobplan.PERSONGROUP,Maximo.jobplan.PLUSCREVNUM,Maximo.jobplan.PLUSCCHANGEDATE from Maximo.jobplan where date(pluscchangedate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy labor trans from maximo to raw landing zone.

query.value: select  Maximo.labtrans.refwo, Maximo.labtrans.siteid, Maximo.labtrans.ORGID, Maximo.labtrans.LOCATION, Maximo.labtrans.transdate,Maximo.labtrans.craft,Maximo.labtrans.laborcode,Maximo.labtrans.payrate,Maximo.labtrans.startdatetime,Maximo.labtrans.finishdatetime,Maximo.labtrans.regularhrs,Maximo.labtrans.startdate,Maximo.labtrans.finishdate,Maximo.labtrans.labtransid from Maximo.labtrans where date(transdate)=  '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy labor trans from maximo to raw landing zone.

query.value: select  Maximo.labtrans.refwo, Maximo.labtrans.siteid, Maximo.labtrans.ORGID, Maximo.labtrans.LOCATION, Maximo.labtrans.transdate,Maximo.labtrans.craft,Maximo.labtrans.laborcode,Maximo.labtrans.payrate,Maximo.labtrans.startdatetime,Maximo.labtrans.finishdatetime,Maximo.labtrans.regularhrs,Maximo.labtrans.startdate,Maximo.labtrans.finishdate,Maximo.labtrans.labtransid from Maximo.labtrans where date(transdate)=  '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy location from maximo to raw landing zone.

query.value:
select Maximo.Locations.Location,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.Locations.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|")','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.Locations.type,Maximo.Locations.changeby,Maximo.Locations.changedate,Maximo.Locations.status,Maximo.Locations.Statusdate,Maximo.Locations.siteid,Maximo.locations.orgid from Maximo.Locations
where date(statusdate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy location from maximo to raw landing zone.

query.value:
select Maximo.Locations.Location,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.Locations.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|")','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.Locations.type,Maximo.Locations.changeby,Maximo.Locations.changedate,Maximo.Locations.status,Maximo.Locations.Statusdate,Maximo.Locations.siteid,Maximo.locations.orgid from Maximo.Locations
where date(statusdate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: Pipline to transfer maximo Asset to raw landing zone.

query.value:
select Maximo.Asset.ASSETNUM,Maximo.Asset.ASSETTAG, Maximo.Asset.LOCATION,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.Asset.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|")','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.Asset.InstallDate,Maximo.asset.siteid,Maximo.Asset.orgid,Maximo.Asset.changedate from Maximo.Asset
where date(changedate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: Pipline to transfer maximo Asset to raw landing zone.

query.value:
select Maximo.Asset.ASSETNUM,Maximo.Asset.ASSETTAG, Maximo.Asset.LOCATION,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.Asset.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|")','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.Asset.InstallDate,Maximo.asset.siteid,Maximo.Asset.orgid,Maximo.Asset.changedate from Maximo.Asset
where date(changedate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: Copying person master data from maximo to raw landing zone
Copying person master data from maximo to raw landing zone
To copy data in bulk for workorder

query.value:
select Maximo.WorkOrder.WONUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.PARENT,Maximo.WorkOrder.GOVTWONUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.JPNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.ASSETNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.ORGID,Maximo.WorkOrder.SITEID,Maximo.WorkOrder.LOCATION,Maximo.WorkOrder.STATUS,Maximo.WorkOrder.WORKTYPE,Maximo.WorkOrder.TASKID,Maximo.WorkOrder.ISTASK,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.WorkOrder.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|"|\\|\/)','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.WorkOrder.PLUSCJPREVNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.WOPRIORITY,Maximo.WorkOrder.CHANGEDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.STATUSDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.CHANGEBY,Maximo.WorkOrder.PMDUEDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.TARGSTARTDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.TARGCOMPDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.REPORTDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.RESPONDBY,Maximo.WorkOrder.estdur,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTLABHRS,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTSTART,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTFINISH,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTINTLABHRS,Maximo.WorkOrder.WOGROUP,Maximo.WorkOrder.PERSONGROUP,Maximo.WorkOrder.OWNERGROUP,Maximo.WorkOrder.PLUSCFREQUENCY,Maximo.WorkOrder.PLUSCFREQUNIT,Maximo.WorkOrder.PMNEXTDUEDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.PMNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.workorderid from Maximo.WorkOrder 
where  date(statusdate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy data in bulk for workorder

query.value:
select Maximo.WorkOrder.WONUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.PARENT,Maximo.WorkOrder.GOVTWONUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.JPNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.ASSETNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.ORGID,Maximo.WorkOrder.SITEID,Maximo.WorkOrder.LOCATION,Maximo.WorkOrder.STATUS,Maximo.WorkOrder.WORKTYPE,Maximo.WorkOrder.TASKID,Maximo.WorkOrder.ISTASK,REGEXP_REPLACE(Maximo.WorkOrder.DESCRIPTION,'(\n|,|\r|\r\n|"|\\|\/)','') AS DESCRIPTION,Maximo.WorkOrder.PLUSCJPREVNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.WOPRIORITY,Maximo.WorkOrder.CHANGEDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.STATUSDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.CHANGEBY,Maximo.WorkOrder.PMDUEDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.TARGSTARTDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.TARGCOMPDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.REPORTDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.RESPONDBY,Maximo.WorkOrder.estdur,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTLABHRS,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTSTART,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTFINISH,Maximo.WorkOrder.ACTINTLABHRS,Maximo.WorkOrder.WOGROUP,Maximo.WorkOrder.PERSONGROUP,Maximo.WorkOrder.OWNERGROUP,Maximo.WorkOrder.PLUSCFREQUENCY,Maximo.WorkOrder.PLUSCFREQUNIT,Maximo.WorkOrder.PMNEXTDUEDATE,Maximo.WorkOrder.PMNUM,Maximo.WorkOrder.workorderid from Maximo.WorkOrder 
where  date(statusdate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy data in bulk for workorder

query.value:
select  wo.WONUM,wo.PARENT,wo.STATUS,wo.CHANGEDATE,wo.CHANGEBY,wo.ORGID,wo.SITEID from Maximo.wostatus wo , Maximo.Workorder wk where wk.wonum  = wo.wonum 
and wk.siteid = wo.siteid and date(wo.changedate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: To copy data in bulk for workorder

query.value:
select  wo.WONUM,wo.PARENT,wo.STATUS,wo.CHANGEDATE,wo.CHANGEBY,wo.ORGID,wo.SITEID from Maximo.wostatus wo , Maximo.Workorder wk where wk.wonum  = wo.wonum 
and wk.siteid = wo.siteid and date(wo.changedate) = '@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

properties.description: This data set is used for retrieving data from maximo to raw landing through Db2 connector.

sources.name: sourceJP2
sources.description: Import data from Jopplan where Site is null

scriptLines: query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' and SITE_ID>0\n',
query: 'SELECT WONUM,SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID,JPNUM FROM MXMDW.WORKORDER WHERE JPNUM<>\'NA\'',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' and SITE_ID<0',
union1 derive(JP_ID = iifNull(JP_ID, toInteger(-1), JP_ID)) ~> derivedColumn1
query: 'SELECT ASSETNUM,ASSETTAG,LOCATION,SITEID,DESCRIPTION AS ASSET_DESCRIPTION,INSTALLDATE AS INSTALL_DATE\nFROM MXMSTG.STG_ASSET',

PLUSCCHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(PLUSCCHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(PLUSCCHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'))) ~> dCRawStgJobPlan

PLUSCCHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(PLUSCCHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(PLUSCCHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'))) ~> dCRawStgJobPlan

CHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

CHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

CHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

STATUSDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(STATUSDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(STATUSDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

REPORTDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(REPORTDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(REPORTDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

RESPONDBY = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(RESPONDBY, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(RESPONDBY, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

CHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

STATUSDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(STATUSDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(STATUSDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

REPORTDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(REPORTDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(REPORTDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

RESPONDBY = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(RESPONDBY, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(RESPONDBY, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

CHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

STATUSDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(STATUSDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(STATUSDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

REPORTDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(REPORTDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(REPORTDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

RESPONDBY = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(RESPONDBY, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(RESPONDBY, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),
query: 'SELECT ASSETNUM,ASSETTAG,LOCATION,SITEID,ORGID,DESCRIPTION AS ASSET_DESCRIPTION,INSTALLDATE AS INSTALL_DATE\nFROM MXMSTG.STG_ASSET',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID ,O.ORGANIZATION_NM,S.SITE_NM
FROM
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
S.ORGANIZATION_ID=O.ORGANIZATION_ID
',
query: 'SELECT ASSETNUM,ASSETTAG,LOCATION,SITEID,ORGID,DESCRIPTION AS ASSET_DESCRIPTION,INSTALLDATE AS INSTALL_DATE\nFROM MXMSTG.STG_ASSET',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID ,O.ORGANIZATION_NM,S.SITE_NM
FROM
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
S.ORGANIZATION_ID=O.ORGANIZATION_ID
',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,O.ORGANIZATION_NM AS ORGANIZATION_NM, S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE O.ORGANIZATION_ID = S.ORGANIZATION_ID',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,O.ORGANIZATION_NM AS ORGANIZATION_NM, S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE O.ORGANIZATION_ID = S.ORGANIZATION_ID',

query: 'SELECT 
WO.WONUM AS WONUM,WO.PARENT AS PARENT,GOVTWONUM,WO.ORGID,WO.SITEID,LOCATION,WS.STATUS AS STATUS,ASSETNUM,JPNUM, WS.CHANGEDATE AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,
WORKTYPE,TASKID,ISTASK, DESCRIPTION,PLUSCJPREVNUM,WOPRIORITY,WO.CHANGEDATE AS WO_CHANGEDATE,STATUSDATE,WS.CHANGEBY AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEBY, PMDUEDATE,
TARGSTARTDATE,TARGCOMPDATE,REPORTDATE,ACTLABHRS,ACTSTART, ACTFINISH,ACTINTLABHRS,ESTDUR,WOGROUP,PERSONGROUP,OWNERGROUP,PLUSCFREQUENCY,PLUSCFREQUNIT,
PMNEXTDUEDATE,PMNUM
FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO, MXMSTG.STG_WOSTATUS WS
 WHERE
 WS.WONUM=WO.WONUM
 AND WS.ORGID=WO.ORGID
 AND WS.SITEID=WO.SITEID',
query: 'SELECT ASSET_ID,ASSETNUM AS ASSETNUM_ref,SITE_ID AS SITE_ID_ref FROM MXMDW.ASSET',

query: 'SELECT PERSON_ID,PERSON_NBR,P.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID FROM 
MXMDW.PERSON P,
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
O.ORGANIZATION_ID =S.ORGANIZATION_ID
AND S.SITE_ID=P.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID AS JPRef_SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID AS JPRef_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' AND SITE_ID>0',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_ID, WONUM,SITE_ID,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,SNAPSHOT_DATE FROM MXMDW.OPERATION WHERE CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1',
query: 'SELECT WONUM AS RefWONUM,S.SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID,STATUS AS RefSTATUS,STATUSDATE AS RefSTATUSDATE,\'1\' AS FLAG FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO,MXMDW.SITE S\nWHERE\nWO.SITEID=S.SITE_NM',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID AS JPRef_SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID AS JPRef_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' AND SITE_ID<0',

query: 'SELECT 
WO.WONUM AS WONUM,WO.PARENT AS PARENT,GOVTWONUM,WO.ORGID,WO.SITEID,LOCATION,WS.STATUS AS STATUS,ASSETNUM,JPNUM, WS.CHANGEDATE AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,
WORKTYPE,TASKID,ISTASK, DESCRIPTION,PLUSCJPREVNUM,WOPRIORITY,WO.CHANGEDATE AS WO_CHANGEDATE,STATUSDATE,WS.CHANGEBY AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEBY, PMDUEDATE,
TARGSTARTDATE,TARGCOMPDATE,REPORTDATE,ACTLABHRS,ACTSTART, ACTFINISH,ACTINTLABHRS,ESTDUR,WOGROUP,PERSONGROUP,OWNERGROUP,PLUSCFREQUENCY,PLUSCFREQUNIT,
PMNEXTDUEDATE,PMNUM
FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO, MXMSTG.STG_WOSTATUS WS
 WHERE
 WS.WONUM=WO.WONUM
 AND WS.ORGID=WO.ORGID
 AND WS.SITEID=WO.SITEID',
query: 'SELECT ASSET_ID,ASSETNUM AS ASSETNUM_ref,SITE_ID AS SITE_ID_ref FROM MXMDW.ASSET',

query: 'SELECT PERSON_ID,PERSON_NBR,P.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID FROM 
MXMDW.PERSON P,
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
O.ORGANIZATION_ID =S.ORGANIZATION_ID
AND S.SITE_ID=P.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID AS JPRef_SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID AS JPRef_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' AND SITE_ID>0',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_ID, WONUM,SITE_ID,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,SNAPSHOT_DATE FROM MXMDW.OPERATION WHERE CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1',
query: 'SELECT WONUM AS RefWONUM,S.SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID,STATUS AS RefSTATUS,STATUSDATE AS RefSTATUSDATE,\'1\' AS FLAG FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO,MXMDW.SITE S\nWHERE\nWO.SITEID=S.SITE_NM',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID AS JPRef_SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID AS JPRef_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' AND SITE_ID<0',

query: 'SELECT 
WO.WONUM AS WONUM,WO.PARENT AS PARENT,GOVTWONUM,WO.ORGID,WO.SITEID,LOCATION,WS.STATUS AS STATUS,ASSETNUM,JPNUM, WS.CHANGEDATE AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,
WORKTYPE,TASKID,ISTASK, DESCRIPTION,PLUSCJPREVNUM,WOPRIORITY,WO.CHANGEDATE AS WO_CHANGEDATE,STATUSDATE,WS.CHANGEBY AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEBY, PMDUEDATE,
TARGSTARTDATE,TARGCOMPDATE,REPORTDATE,ACTLABHRS,ACTSTART, ACTFINISH,ACTINTLABHRS,ESTDUR,WOGROUP,PERSONGROUP,OWNERGROUP,PLUSCFREQUENCY,PLUSCFREQUNIT,
PMNEXTDUEDATE,PMNUM
FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO, MXMSTG.STG_WOSTATUS WS
 WHERE
 WS.WONUM=WO.WONUM
 AND WS.ORGID=WO.ORGID
 AND WS.SITEID=WO.SITEID',
query: 'SELECT ASSET_ID,ASSETNUM AS ASSETNUM_ref,SITE_ID AS SITE_ID_ref FROM MXMDW.ASSET',

query: 'SELECT PERSON_ID,PERSON_NBR,P.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID FROM 
MXMDW.PERSON P,
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
O.ORGANIZATION_ID =S.ORGANIZATION_ID
AND S.SITE_ID=P.SITE_ID',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_ID, WONUM,SITE_ID,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,SNAPSHOT_DATE FROM MXMDW.OPERATION WHERE CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1',
query: 'SELECT WONUM AS RefWONUM,S.SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID,STATUS AS RefSTATUS,CHANGEDATE AS RefCHANGEDATE,\'1\' AS FLAG FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO,MXMDW.SITE S\nWHERE\nWO.SITEID=S.SITE_NM',

query: 'SELECT WONUM AS WORK_ORDER,GOVTWONUM AS GOVT_WO,OPS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,OPS.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,OPS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION,OPS.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
ISNULL(A.ASSETNUM,'NA') AS ASSET,
OPS.ASSET_ID AS ASSET_ID,
REPORTDATE AS REPORTED_DATE,WOPRIORITY AS PRIORITY,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,TARGSTARTDATE AS TARGET_START_DT,
TARGCOMPDATE AS TARGET_FINISH_DT,PERSON_GROUP AS WORK_GROUP,WORKTYPE AS WORK_TYPE,PMDUEDATE AS PM_DUE_DT,
S.SITE_NM AS SITE,OPS.WORKTYPE_CM_PM AS WORKTYPE_CM_PM,OPS.PERSON_GROUP_ID AS PERSON_GROUP_ID,OPS.SNAPSHOT_DATE AS SNAPSHOT_DT
FROM
MXMDW.OPERATION OPS INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID=OPS.SITE_ID
AND OPS.ISTASK = 0
AND OPS.CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1
--AND OPS.EFFECTIVE_DT>= CONVERT (DATE, SYSDATETIME())
AND OPS.EFFECTIVE_DT= (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) FROM MXMDW.OPERATION)
LEFT OUTER JOIN MXMDW.ASSET A
ON A.ASSET_ID=OPS.ASSET_ID
',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_SUMMARY_ID AS ExistOPERATION_SUMMARY_ID,WORK_ORDER AS ExistWORK_ORDER,SITE AS ExistSITE,SRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY AS ExistSRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY FROM MXMDM.OPERATION_SUMMARY',
query: 'SELECT LOCATION_ID AS RefLOCATION_ID,LOCATION,SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS',

query: 'SELECT WONUM AS WORK_ORDER,GOVTWONUM AS GOVT_WO,OPS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,OPS.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,OPS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION,OPS.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
ISNULL(A.ASSETNUM,'NA') AS ASSET,
OPS.ASSET_ID AS ASSET_ID,
REPORTDATE AS REPORTED_DATE,WOPRIORITY AS PRIORITY,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,TARGSTARTDATE AS TARGET_START_DT,
TARGCOMPDATE AS TARGET_FINISH_DT,PERSON_GROUP AS WORK_GROUP,WORKTYPE AS WORK_TYPE,PMDUEDATE AS PM_DUE_DT,
S.SITE_NM AS SITE,OPS.WORKTYPE_CM_PM AS WORKTYPE_CM_PM,OPS.PERSON_GROUP_ID AS PERSON_GROUP_ID,OPS.SNAPSHOT_DATE AS SNAPSHOT_DT
FROM
MXMDW.OPERATION OPS INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID=OPS.SITE_ID
AND OPS.ISTASK = 0
AND OPS.CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1
--AND OPS.EFFECTIVE_DT>= CONVERT (DATE, SYSDATETIME())
AND OPS.EFFECTIVE_DT= (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) FROM MXMDW.OPERATION)
LEFT OUTER JOIN MXMDW.ASSET A
ON A.ASSET_ID=OPS.ASSET_ID
',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_SUMMARY_ID AS ExistOPERATION_SUMMARY_ID,WORK_ORDER AS ExistWORK_ORDER,SITE AS ExistSITE,SRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY AS ExistSRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY FROM MXMDM.OPERATION_SUMMARY',
query: 'SELECT LOCATION_ID AS RefLOCATION_ID,LOCATION,SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS',

query: '

SELECT WORK_ORDER,GOVT_WO,ORGANIZATION_ID,SITE_ID,DESCRIPTION,LOCATION, ASSET,
REPORTED_DATE,PRIORITY,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,TARGET_START_DT,TARGET_FINISH_DT,WORK_GROUP,WORK_TYPE,
PM_DUE_DT, SITE,WORKTYPE_CM_PM, TRADES
FROM(
SELECT WONUM AS WORK_ORDER,GOVTWONUM AS GOVT_WO,OPS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,OPS.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,OPS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION,OPS.LOCATION AS LOCATION,
ISNULL(A.ASSETNUM,'NA') AS ASSET,
OPS.ASSET_ID AS ASSET_ID,
REPORTDATE AS REPORTED_DATE,WOPRIORITY AS PRIORITY,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,TARGSTARTDATE AS TARGET_START_DT,
TARGCOMPDATE AS TARGET_FINISH_DT,PERSON_GROUP AS WORK_GROUP,WORKTYPE AS WORK_TYPE,PMDUEDATE AS PM_DUE_DT,
S.SITE_NM AS SITE,OPS.WORKTYPE_CM_PM AS WORKTYPE_CM_PM,OPS.TRADES AS TRADES,
RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY WONUM,PARENT,OPS.SITE_ID ORDER BY WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE DESC) RNK
FROM
MXMDW.OPERATION OPS INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID=OPS.SITE_ID
AND OPS.ISTASK = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN MXMDW.ASSET A
ON A.ASSET_ID=OPS.ASSET_ID
) TMP
WHERE RNK=1

',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_SUMMARY_ID AS ExistOPERATION_SUMMARY_ID,WORK_ORDER AS ExistWORK_ORDER,SRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY AS ExistSRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY FROM MXMDM.OPERATION_SUMMARY',

query: '

SELECT WORK_ORDER,GOVT_WO,ORGANIZATION_ID,SITE_ID,DESCRIPTION,LOCATION_ID, ASSET,
REPORTED_DATE,PRIORITY,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,TARGET_START_DT,TARGET_FINISH_DT,WORK_GROUP,WORK_TYPE,
PM_DUE_DT, SITE,WORKTYPE_CM_PM, TRADES
FROM(
SELECT WONUM AS WORK_ORDER,GOVTWONUM AS GOVT_WO,OPS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,OPS.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,OPS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION,OPS.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
ISNULL(A.ASSETNUM,'NA') AS ASSET,
OPS.ASSET_ID AS ASSET_ID,
REPORTDATE AS REPORTED_DATE,WOPRIORITY AS PRIORITY,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,TARGSTARTDATE AS TARGET_START_DT,
TARGCOMPDATE AS TARGET_FINISH_DT,PERSON_GROUP AS WORK_GROUP,WORKTYPE AS WORK_TYPE,PMDUEDATE AS PM_DUE_DT,
S.SITE_NM AS SITE,OPS.WORKTYPE_CM_PM AS WORKTYPE_CM_PM,OPS.TRADES AS TRADES,
RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY WONUM,PARENT,OPS.SITE_ID ORDER BY WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE DESC) RNK
FROM
MXMDW.OPERATION OPS INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID=OPS.SITE_ID
AND OPS.ISTASK = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN MXMDW.ASSET A
ON A.ASSET_ID=OPS.ASSET_ID
) TMP
WHERE RNK=1

',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_SUMMARY_ID AS ExistOPERATION_SUMMARY_ID,WORK_ORDER AS ExistWORK_ORDER,SITE AS ExistSITE,SRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY AS ExistSRC_TYPE_HASH_KEY FROM MXMDM.OPERATION_SUMMARY',
query: 'SELECT LOCATION_ID AS RefLOCATION_ID,LOCATION,SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS',

query: 'SELECT
WORK_ORDER,
GOVT_WO,
SMRY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION,
SMRY.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,
SITE,
SMRY.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
SMRY.LOCATION AS LOCATION,
ASSET,
REPORTED_DATE,
SMRY.STATUS AS STATUS,
SMRY.WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,
PRIORITY,
TARGET_START_DT,
TARGET_FINISH_DT,
SMRY.ACTLABHRS AS ACTLABHRS,
WORK_GROUP,
WORK_TYPE,
PM_DUE_DT,
WO_OPEN_DT,
WO_DUE_DT,
WO_PRIORITY_THRESHOLD_DAYS,
WO_CLOSE_DT,
WO_AGE,
WO_AGE_SEGMENT,
WORK_TYPE_CM_PM,
SMRY.PERSON_GROUP_ID AS PERSON_GROUP_ID,
IS_BACKLOG,
EOMONTH(DATEADD(mm, -1, getdate())) AS SNAPSHOT_DT
FROM MXMDM.OPERATION_SUMMARY SMRY
INNER JOIN MXMDW.OPERATION OPS 
ON SMRY.WORK_ORDER = OPS.WONUM
AND SMRY.SITE_ID = OPS.SITE_ID
AND OPS.ISTASK=0
AND OPS.CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1
AND OPS.STATUS_FLAG=1
AND OPS.SNAPSHOT_DATE <=(SELECT MAX(SNAPSHOT_DATE) FROM MXMDW.OPERATION)
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_NM = SMRY.SITE
',

query: '
SELECT 
PERSONID AS PERSON_NBR,
FIRSTNAME AS PERSON_FIRST_NM,
LASTNAME AS PERSON_LAST_NM,
STATUS AS STATUS,
DEPARTMENT AS DEPARTMENT,
TITLE AS TITLE,
EMPLOYEETYPE AS EMPLOYEE_TYPE,
JOBCODE AS JOBCODE,
SUPERVISOR AS SUPERVISOR,
BIRTHDATE,
HIREDATE,
TERMINATIONDATE,
LOCATION,
LOCATIONSITE,
STATUSDATE
FROM MXMSTG.STG_PERSON',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT WONUM, PARENT,SITE_ID,ISTASK,ACTLABHRS FROM MXMDW.OPERATION WHERE ACTLABHRS>0 AND CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,O.ORGANIZATION_NM AS ORGANIZATION_NM, S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE O.ORGANIZATION_ID = S.ORGANIZATION_ID',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,O.ORGANIZATION_NM AS ORGANIZATION_NM, S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
